bibl.title: Petitioner v. Defendant. Type of document
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: I reside n town Spokane Falls in a lodging at the Brurary, I Knew James Finch in his life time that was his right name, did not se him after death, saw him after he was shot seen him over in this house where he was shot saw wound on him saw him about 8 O'clock PM before he was wounded, I was only in about 5 or 10 minutes went out and they would not let me in again, Dr. morgan was there whens I was there

I knew this man in hs life time knew him since I was twentyyears old. Know him about here six weeks He had about threww miles above spingle for Kingman & Smith I was working there with him knew him pretty well not engaged in buisness together in any wasy Had been working together Called echother partners this was the first time he told me that he was in Spokane Falls Would he said to see the town Came in town with him on the afternoon of the Homicide at about 4 O'Clock the Bank was just closed they were a few minutes late Could not Cash their Checks Remained together up to 8 OClock left him about that time
